banner.timeLeft: Time left until the new collection

collection.heading:
Summer 2025 Collection
Now available!
collection.description: A bold design meets subtle elegance. Every piece is crafted for the woman who isn’t afraid to be seen.

about.heading: Made in Poland
about.description: Every Lady Drama design is created 100% in Poland – from the first sketch to the final stitch. Our garments are the result of passion, precision, and time spent perfecting every detail. We prioritize quality, so our creative process is never rushed. Each collection is a unique story, crafted for women who appreciate not only beauty but also craftsmanship. We source fabrics from all over the world – from Italian silks to handwoven materials from Japan – all to provide unmatched quality and patterns you won’t find anywhere else.

about_section.title:
WELCOME TO
THE WORLD OF
LADY DRAMA®
about_section.paragraph1: Lady Drama® is a brand created by women for women. We focus on quality and uniqueness. The entire product is made in Poland from start to finish.
about_section.paragraph2: We design our own prints to ensure the uniqueness of our collections, which are aimed at women who value originality and unconventional style. Modern and individualistic. Fashion and style enthusiasts. What sets us apart is a sense of taste and elegance in every form, as well as attention to the smallest detail.
